title: I can't buy RP !!! RiOT HELP
body: I bought my pre-paid cards but I can't put it in because the store is dark, I can't see nothing. I uninstall and install the game and still the same thing. help Riot pls !!!!

replies.body:
Store issues can be caused by a number of different problems. Since the store heavily relies on Internet Explorer settings, certain security settings within IE can cause problems. We've consolidated the most common solutions inside of our [Store Issues guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202536660), so I recommend starting there.

Let me know if those steps resolved this.
Thanks Riot <3 first time ever someone from you guys answer me XD  thank you tho

Same thing happens to me on my LAN account (I live in Mexico). My guess is the server is down/ on mantainance or soemthing like that. I want to purchase rp with my debit card but when I press the rp button the window pops up but it never leaves the loading state now matter how many times I try. One time it did go through but it got stuck on the 3rd step. My best guess it will fix itself later. I would wait a couple of hours and then contact support directly if nothing changes
